comments.author: fMichaleczek
comments.body:
I followed yours instructions with this environment : 
- raspberry 2 with a fresh install of raspbian stretch ( 2017-09-07 )
- hyperv VM with a fresh install of ubuntu 16.04 ( 16.04.3-desktop-amd64 )

A first error occur here, about **LD_LIBRARY_PATH**, resolved by setting it to : 
``PS /opt/PowerShell> Start-PSBootstrap``
``Installing PowerShell build dependencies``
``dotnet not present.  Installing dotnet.``
``Unable to find dotnet installation to remove.``
``./dotnet-install.sh: line 210: LD_LIBRARY_PATH: unbound variable``
``Execution of {``
``            curl -sO $obtainUrl/$installScript``
``            bash ./$installScript -c $Channel -v $Version``
``        } failed with exit code 1``
``At /opt/PowerShell/build.psm1:1750 char:13``
``+             throw "Execution of {$sb} failed with exit code $LASTEXIT ...``
``+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~``
``    + CategoryInfo          : OperationStopped: (Execution of {``
``...ith exit code 1:String) [], RuntimeException``
``    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : Execution of {``
``            curl -sO $obtainUrl/$installScript``
``            bash ./$installScript -c $Channel -v $Version``
``        } failed with exit code 1``
 
Then, after overwrite the CoreClr bits, you have to do an extra part to install libunwind8
``sudo apt install libunwind8``

At the end, powershell is loaded.

On a Rasperry 2 : 
``Measure-Command { powershell -c "1" } `` : near 15sec.
CPU Usage at startup : near 40% 
Usage memory : near 50MB

Thank you some much !!

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
@fmichaleczek Unfortunately https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/7698 broke our `start-psbootstrap` script which is what is also causing the Linux Travis-CI run to fail.

The startup time is slow because crossgen currently doesn't support arm32 which would recompile the .Net IL to native code.

comments.author: stefanstranger
comments.body:
I was able to start pwsh after running:

```bash
# We'll make a folder to put latest CoreCLR runtime.
mkdir dotnet
cd dotnet
# Download the latest CoreCLR runtime.
curl -O https://dotnetcli.blob.core.windows.net/dotnet/Runtime/master/dotnet-runtime-latest-linux-arm.tar.gz
# Unpack it.
tar xvf ./dotnet-runtime-latest-linux-arm.tar.gz
# We're going to overwrite the CoreCLR bits we built with newer ones, replace the version named folder below as appropriate.
# If you build a newer version of PowerShell Core, you'll need to make sure you get latest CoreCLR runtime otherwise you may hit a segmentation fault.
cp shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/2.1.0-preview1-26026-02/* ~/powershell
# Install libunwind8
sudo apt install libunwind8
```

But soon after PowerShell was started it aborted with the following error:

```
PowerShell v6.0.0-rc.2-70-gc17a975683a0df639030521777d9cdc764784799
Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

https://aka.ms/pscore6-docs
Type 'help' to get help.

FailFast: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Memory, Version=4.0.1.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51'. The system cannot find the file specified.


   at System.Environment.FailFast(System.String, System.Exception)
   at System.Environment.FailFast(System.String, System.Exception)
   at Microsoft.PowerShell.UnmanagedPSEntry.Start(System.String, System.String[], Int32)
   at Microsoft.PowerShell.ManagedPSEntry.Main(System.String[])
Aborted
```

Raspberry Pi 2 info:
```
pi@raspberrypi:~ $ dmesg | grep "Machine"
[    0.000000] OF: fdt:Machine model: Raspberry Pi 2 Model B Rev 1.1
pi@raspberrypi:~ $
```

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @stefanstranger you shouldn't have to install dotnet as it comes with the PSCore6 package.  Make sure you follow the updated [instructions](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md#installation-1)
